DOC.brief_summary: The objective study compare safety DFD01 Spray Comp01 Lotion topical treatment moderate plaque psoriasis compare efficacy DFD01 Spray Placebo Spray topical treatment moderate plaque psoriasis 28 day treatment .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison DFD01 Spray Versus Comp01 Lotion , Vehicle Spray Vehicle Lotion Subjects With Moderate Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Subjects must present clinical diagnosis stable ( least 3 month ) plaquetype psoriasis . Subjects psoriasis involve 10 20 % BSA , include face , scalp , groin , axillae intertriginous area . Subjects must IGA grade 3 ( moderate ) Baseline Visit Current diagnosis unstable form psoriasis include guttate , erythrodermic , exfoliative pustular psoriasis . Other inflammatory skin disease may confound evaluation plaque psoriasis ( e.g. , atopic dermatitis , contact dermatitis , tinea corporis ) . Presence pigmentation , extensive scarring , pigment lesion sunburn could interfere rating efficacy parameter . History psoriasis unresponsive topical treatment . History organ transplant require immunosuppression , HIV , immunocompromised state .
